scripts.clear: rm -rf tst && rm -rf cjs && rm -rf coverage && rm -rf docs && rm -rf dts && rm -rf esm && rm -rf tsconfig/*.tsbuildinfo
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage && npm run compile_all && npm run docs
scripts.compile_all: npm run compile_cjs && npm run compile_esm && npm run compile_dts && npm run compile_bin
